name: insanity brush
description:
Trapped in a painting office with your master, you must clean the painting spots before the smell brings you crazy...

Made during the GMTK Jam 2020 with the theme Out of Control.

Credits :

  • Baptiste REY, programeur
  • Paul REY, game artist

All the assets (3d models, animations...), except the sounds and musics, have been made during the jam !

Musics : 

  • "Dog Bird Pig Frog" by Monplaisir
  • "She's gone" by Monplaisir
  • "Something to Save" by Komiku
  • "Get Ready" by Komiku

Sound Effects :

  • Website : https://freesound.org/
